law.catch_line: Perinatal Advisory Committee -- Membership -- Meetings -- Report.

section.section: The committee may make recommendations on evidence-based guidelines and programs to improve the outcomes of pregnancies, including ways to improve coordination of existing programs operated by the cabinet and private organizations.

text.section: Other subject matter experts may be represented as members of the advisory committee at the discretion of the secretary.
The advisory committee shall meet at least quarterly and shall hold its first meeting no later than thirty (30) days after June 25, 2013.
The advisory committee shall submit an annual report of its activities and recommendations to the secretary and the commissioner.

law.history: Created 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 13, effective June 25, 2013.
